mem_uniformity:

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/

theorem mem_uniformity {s : set (R × R)} :
    s ∈ (uniform_space_core abv).uniformity ↔ ∃ ε > 0, ∀ {a b : R}, abv (b - a) < ε → (a, b) ∈ s :=
  by
  suffices
    s ∈
        «expr⨅ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , »"
          ((filter.principal) { p : R × R | abv (p.2 - p.1) < ε.val }) ↔
      _
    by
    rw [infᵢ_subtype] at this
    exact this
  rw [mem_infi_of_directed]
  · simp [subset_def]
  · rintro ⟨r, hr⟩ ⟨p, hp⟩
    exact ⟨⟨min r p, lt_min hr hp⟩, by simp (config := { contextual := true }) [lt_min_iff, (· ≥ ·)]⟩
#align mem_uniformity mem_uniformity
